thread.title: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang a Manchester City target with Pep Guardiola prepared to go all-out for Borussia Dortmund forward if Sergio Aguero leaves

author: ashilton
title: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang a Manchester City target with Pep Guardiola prepared to go all-out for Borussia Dortmund forward if Sergio Aguero leaves
text:
EFL AUBA THE MOON Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang a Manchester City target with Pep Guardiola prepared to go all-out for Borussia Dortmund forward if Sergio Aguero leaves 
Aguero has hinted he could leave the Etihad this summer after losing his City spot to Samba sensation Gabriel Jesus Exclusive
